alert.note: Alert for Northern Livingston; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 4:09AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST, ASCENSION, NORTHERN ST. JAMES, SOUTH CENTRAL LIVINGSTON AND SOUTHEASTERN IBERVILLE PARISHES THROUGH 445 AM CST... At 409 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over White Castle, or 8 miles northwest of Donaldsonville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, St. Gabriel, White Castle, Sorrento, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Prairieville, Geismar, Carville, and Whitehall. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 171 and 191. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Livingston; St. John The Baptist
